overview: VIXEN.com proudly presents the fifth edition of its world-renowned series - Threesome Fantasy! The celebrated series returns with a brand new set of scorching threesomes featuring the most beautiful women in the world. Cover girls Gianna Dior and Riley Steele play a pair of insatiable best friends crashing an exclusive sex club's rendez-vous. Also featuring the fantasy pairings of Little Caprice & Tori Black; Ariana Marie & Eliza Ibarra; and Harley Dean & Kira Noir. Expect VIXEN.com's masterful direction, sensual storylines, and elegant locations - but be blown away by the absolute passion and beauty on display. Threesome Fantasy Vol. 5 is not to be missed!
title: Threesome Fantasies 5
